about_intro: NoteX is a lightweight desktop app for quick notes that's always at hand and never gets in the way of your work.
about_features: Pin notes directly to the desktop
about_differences_title: What makes NoteX different from regular note apps
about_differences: Works as part of the desktop, not just a regular window
Minimalism and maximum focus on a single note
Fully offline: no accounts, no servers, no syncing. Your data stays only on your device
Control the app from the keyboard using global shortcuts
Lightweight and independent application without overloaded features
hk_err_diff: Pin and Unpin must be different
hk_err_busy: This shortcut is busy or can't be registered
hk_err_default_pin: Default pin shortcut can't be registered
hk_err_default_unpin: Default unpin shortcut can't be registered
